name: Mega Monsters Giga Strike
description:
Battle and Capture post-apocalyptic monsters in this Pokemon-meets-Slay-the-Spire inspired cardgame.

This game was made in a week as part of a Game Jam.

Hey kids, do you want to become the ultimate Mega Monster trainer? Do you want to make all your friends jealous? Well now you can with the Mega Monster Giga Strike 3rd Edition Deck, available at your local hobby store.

Did you buy any cards yet, because your school friends did, and you don't want to be left out!

*Can you believe marketing to children like this is still legal, amazing! Don't include that part in the recording Steve.*

Purchase our Mega Shiny Booster Pack for a chance to collect the Giga Rare Elite Mega Monster Shiny Cards!

*Do our packs even contain any rare cards? I've got better odds with a lottery ticket than this cardboard junk.*

Now you can play our digital edition of Mega Monster Giga Strike!

*I just thought, we should release two versions with different monsters so they've gotta buy them both to catch everything. Write that down quick!*

Don't forget to watch the new season of Mega Monster Giga Strike: airing Saturday morning at 8am, only on your favourite cartoon channel!

*Can you believe we made 8 seasons just to sell trading cards... Alright that's all you're getting from me today, now where's my damn espresso?*
